name: Barge In
originalText: Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Each attacking non-Human creature gains trample until end of turn.

rulings.text: If the target attacking creature is an illegal target by the time Barge In tries to resolve, the spell won't resolve. Your attacking non-Human creatures won't gain trample.
